page.title: 12LOCAL NEWS
page.content: Tracey Peart wrote to the DURHAM ADVERTISER to ask about the major issues dominating the local news.Chief Reporter Steve Jones sent this reply-"The stories affecting your area recently included one about local hairdresser Stephen Brown.He competed in a Triathlon at Peterborough.The event consisted of a two and a half mile swim,a 112 mile bike ride,and a marathon.Frankland Jail is often in the news.Recently an inquiry was held there into a fire in the cell occupied by a murderer who was not hurt.Also the prison's deputy governor,Mr John May,is leaving to become the youngest prison governor at Dartmoor."
